headline: Industrious Ventures Announces Appointment of Matt White, EVP & CFO of Linde, to Stoke Space's Board of Directors
summary: Industrious Ventures, a deep-tech venture firm backing founders reinventing the world's most critical industries, announced today that Matt White, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Linde (NYSE: LIN), has joined the Board of Directors of Stoke Space, serving as the firm's representative.

content.title: Industrious Ventures Announces Appointment of Matt White, EVP & CFO of Linde, to Stoke Space's Board of Directors
content.summary: Industrious Ventures, a deep-tech venture firm backing founders reinventing the world's most critical industries, announced today that Matt White, Executive Vice President and Chief Financial Officer of Linde (NYSE: LIN), has joined the Board of Directors of Stoke Space, serving as the firm's representative.

thumbnail.caption: Industrious Ventures backs founders reinventing the world’s most critical industries—from the deep sea to deep space. With evergreen capital and long-term conviction, the firm partners with deep-tech builders from early development through scale-up and production. Industrious invests across aerospace, national security, energy, compute, manufacturing, and other foundational sectors where innovation strengthens the industrial economy. Learn more at www.industrious.vc.
